title: This Aliexpress PC Case Is CRAZY
description: *Video sponsor* Go check out the BeQuiet PureLoop with this affiliate link:   I build a gaming PC in a crazy case I bought from Aliexpress.  A link to the case in the video:   Get some AWESOME Dawid merch here:   -Here is a link to my Patreon page, it would be awesome if you check it out:   -Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate-  Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch shorts channel:  YouTube:
transcript: i cannot imagine that this case is still in one piece considering that it was apparently shipped by brutalization but while you place your bets it's time for a word from today's video considering that you don't have to pay ridiculous rgb tax on these they are surprisingly affordable and they have a fill port on an aio which i think is really cool so if you like the look of these
